attributes.action: Provide a career check/interview for people who did not perform well at school. An allow them the option of returning to full-time education to pursue a different career avenue(taking a 2-3 year break from mortgage payments etc). And encourage learning throughout life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Provide a career check for people (30-40 years of age). And allow them to return to full-time education(Without having to pay their mortgages/bills). So they may change or further their career more easily.
